artist: Etcher: Antoine-Jean Duclos; Designer: After Jean-Michel Moreau le Jeune
description: at top of plate man on bed with soldiers restraining him; group of people around bed; other soldiers with torches and swords drawn in crowd; below image long text in french
inscription:
Title and Inscription

In plate in black: [EXTINCTION DE LA POSTÉRITÉ DE CHARLEMAGNE/ Année 988 followed by a long paragraph in French]; on plate in pencil: [2-92]; below text in black: [Le Bas diresit]
title: Extinction de la postérité de Charlemagne
